summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to enter into agreements, including an escrow agreement, for further environmental remediation of Puget Park and related property known as the Hudson Street Cement Kiln Dust Site (henceforward "Site"); authorizing the Superintendent to accept a gift of certain real property from John M. McFarland for open space, parks and recreation purposes, and accepting a revised street easement for Puget Way SW.
